name: 07_web_sockets
description: - [ ]   Within a new or existing Node.js and Vue.js application, implement one or more features which add interactive, bidirectional client-server communication using the WebSocket protocol. - [ ]   For Node.js, use the [Node.js WebSocket library](https://github.com/websockets/ws). - [ ]   For Vue.js, use the WebSocket API that is provided by the web browser. - [ ]   Deploy your finished application (including both the Node.js server application and the Vue.js client application) to Heroku.
